Posts.Content: My friend had a mastectomy recently.  Her diagnosis, classical lobular carcinoma, with LCIS.  Multiple nodules were found, the largest tumor being 3.5 cm, over three quadrants.  I'm glad she elected to have the mastectomy.
Posts.Title: Classical lobular carcinoma patients?

Posts.Content: Hi.  I live in Maine and we didn't have an earthquake.  Good gracious.
Posts.Title: Maine?????
